reviews.review:
Não preciso nem me esforçar em detalhar os motivos para quais eu concordo absolutamente com as afirmações extremamente positivas ao jogo, até porquê qualquer elogio que eu venha afazer nesta análise seria redundante.

Com isso dito, venho apenas destacar elementos que certamente são muito positivos para com a experiência da gameplay, como por exemplo:

- O aconchegante charme retro, tipico da era aonde shooters ainda estavam engatinhando. Em outras palavras: Gráficos feios, porém compõem toda a experiência.

- Combate estranhamente livre. Você pode tentar ser tático e letal como Solid Snake, ou agressivo e violento como o Doom Guy.

- Trilha sonora de dar arrepios na espinha, mesmo sendo raras os momentos em que é utilizada.

- Dificuldades que entregam o que sugerem. O modo fácil é de tirar doce de criança e o modo mais difícil é de fazer atiradores mais experientes chorar.

Half Life é certamente um dos pilares que contribuíram para a completa mudança de ponto de vista social com relação aos jogos. Você se diverte, passa raiva, se assusta e ri. Um jogo para todos, porém nem todos nascem para esse jogo.
fuckin shit your pants, remove the pants and throw them at the wall

The game is good but there are a few problems and alot of glitches and bugs, like getting stuck in random geometry (this happens alot), the game being very difficult (maybe im just bad) or the NPCs shooting through walls, but overall i would recommend it

Nach 23 Jahren nach Half-Lifes Veröffentlichsdatum habe ich heute um 13:25 Uhr dieses Spiel mein Kindheitspiel letztendlich komplett gespielt. Und ja würde ich sagen , ich sollte das früher fertigmachen. Aber sowieso , es war sehr emotionaler Moment. Half-Life ist großer und wichtiger Teil meines Lebens. Danke schön Valve ich bin sehr froh dass ich mit Half-Life aufgewachsen bin.

Um dos FPS mais inteligentes já feitos. Diferente de games clássicos do gênero focados na visceralidade como Doom, Quake e Duke Nukem, o jeito "certo" de jogar Half-Life é prestando atenção nos ambientes, usando sinais visuais e sonoros para descobrir o que tem a frente e pensando nas estratégias corretas para lidar com os desafios a seguir. Essa abordagem que exige certo raciocínio e atenção do jogador não se limita só ao encontro com os inimigos, permeando também a narrativa, que nunca lhe entrega as informações de mão beijada e dispensa o uso de cutscenes, e a arquitetura, que se distancia dos espaços abstratos e labirínticos de shooters old-school, antes imergindo o jogador em ambientes perfeitamente verossímeis. É insano pensar que esse foi literalmente o primeiro jogo da Valve - e que coisas melhores ainda estavam a caminho.

This game shapes many games released today and is a monumental game from PC gaming history. Many consider this a timeless classic myself included and to be lucky enough to have friends that are interested in this too just makes this ten times better. One of the best fan bases ever I'd say and its Classic 1995-2002 game style makes this game perfect for many funny animations and memes. From the very attractive people who bought this from launch to the teenagers like me who play this today, I would recommend this game to anyone that likes games and has a PC. Part of the brillness to this game is that it can run on potato specs meaning nobody can have an excuse not to give this game a go. One of the best game to ever be released and I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a low end yet fun single player game to play

8/10

Лёгкий уровень сложности оказался не очень лёгким, боюсь представить что там на сложном. Отдельное спасибо учёным, которые не пытались меня убить. Помощи от них конечно не дождёшься, но тем не менее. Охрана как в школе, очень выручает в случае ЧП. Повсюду разбросаны агрессивные тентакли. Военные работают СЛИШКОМ оперативно, я не успевал даже отойти в туалет. Имеются дружелюбные (и не очень) зверушки.
Това е играта с която съм израснал-любимата ми игра!

Half-Life has one of the best intro sequences I've seen in a video game, and every alien encounter is great both in terms of gameplay and atmosphere. But the moment human enemies are in the picture, every weapon feels like a nerf gun and the action slows to a crawl. Fighting a couple human soldiers somehow feels slower than sneaking around a giant alien tentacle with perfect hearing, despite the latter being *supposed* to be a slow paced sequence. It's a real shame because so much of this game aged really well, but I just can't recommend a first person shooter with such poor gunplay.

Here is a review that doesn't say "it's half life buy it" I've played through the entire campaign (Not at the time of reviewing but if you see ~15 hours in total then I will have finished it) Point is it may have aged a bit and I was pretty skeptical at first, not every part is super exciting but overall I had fun with it, the pixelated textures low poly models and low quality sound files have such a nice charm to them and I feel as though I'm transported back in time. The puzzle design is such a treat and the entire game is pretty beautiful and it's a trip let me tell you. I will never get over the feeling seeing that vast expanse of yellow the first time I came up from underground. Despite the initially offputting quality it grows on your for sure and the game is as immserive as ever. With quicksave in hand no part of it has been too punishing and I've only had to look up a walkthrough 3 times. I think that this is a neccecary play even if it may feel a bit long at times. Would reccomend!
